title: My Account is level 29, but on here when i try to post in threads it's saying I'm level 3?
body: Just trying to join in discussions on various threads that peak my interest. Instead I get a little Amumu picture saying, "So sad... you are not authorized." {{champion:32}}

replies.body: Sometimes these boards account go a little wonky and won't update correctly with your Summoner level. It looks like making this post forced a sync on the backend and I can see you as level 29 right now!
